item.title: 5 Tips to Ace Your Application for the Oracle 'Join the Race 2025' Program
item.description: The announcement of Oracle’s ‘Join the Race 2025’ program has created a huge buzz, and for good reasonâ€”it’s an incredible opportunity to launch your tech career. But in a competitive field, how do you make sure your application gets the attention it deserves? A great application goes beyond just listing your grades. It tells a story of your passion, your skills, and your potential. Here are 5 essential tips to help you prepare a standout application.
